security.title: Security Settings
security.subtitle: Manage two-factor authentication and account security
security.twoFAActiveDesc: Your account is protected with an additional layer of security.

security.activeSessionsDesc: Manage your active sessions across devices. You can have up to 5 active sessions.

security.cantScan: Can't scan? Copy the URI below and enter it manually.

security.backupCodesDesc: Store these codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once. If you lose access to your authenticator app, you'll need these to sign in.
security.disableWarning: This will remove the extra security layer from your account.
security.passkeysDesc: Sign in with biometrics, security keys, or your device PIN — no password needed.

installApp.title: Install MyChef
installApp.subtitle: Get the full app experience. Install MyChef on your device for faster access, offline support, and push notifications.
installApp.manualInstall: Follow the steps below to install

features.fastDesc: Instant load times with cached assets. No waiting for pages to load.
features.offlineDesc: Browse chefs, view bookings, and check messages even without internet.
features.notificationsDesc: Get notified instantly about booking updates, messages, and more.
features.nativeDesc: Full-screen experience that looks and feels like a native app.
features.crossPlatformDesc: Works on phones, tablets, and desktops — one app everywhere.
features.autoUpdateDesc: Automatic updates in the background. Always the latest version.

platforms.chromeStep1: Click the install icon in the address bar (or the three-dot menu).
platforms.chromeStep3: The app will be added to your home screen and app launcher.
platforms.safariStep1: Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen.
platforms.safariStep2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen".
platforms.safariStep3: Tap "Add" to install MyChef on your home screen.

navigation.title: Navigate the Dashboard
navigation.desc: Learn how the sidebar and main navigation work.
navigation.step0Content: This is your main navigation panel. It stays visible on desktop so you can quickly jump between sections.
navigation.step1Content: Click the MyChef logo to return to the main landing page at any time.
navigation.step2Content: Each menu item takes you to a different section of your dashboard. The active page is highlighted in gold.
navigation.step3Content: Your name, role, and sign-out button are here at the bottom of the sidebar.
navigation.step4Content: This is where the content for each page is displayed. Let's explore what you can do!

clientOverview.title: Client Dashboard
clientOverview.desc: Get an overview of your events, bookings, and activity.
clientOverview.step0Content: This is your dashboard overview. It shows a summary of all your activity on MyChef.
clientOverview.step1Content: Click this button to create a new event and start looking for the perfect chef.
clientOverview.step2Content: Track your total events, open events awaiting chefs, and active bookings at a glance.
clientOverview.step3Content: Your latest events are shown here. Click any event to see its details and applications.
clientOverview.step4Content: Your latest bookings with hired chefs appear here, including status and payment info.

clientChefs.title: Find Chefs
clientChefs.desc: Discover and browse verified professional chefs.
clientChefs.step0Content: Here you can browse all verified chefs on the platform. View their profiles, specialties, and ratings.
clientChefs.step1Content: Use this navigation item to access the chef directory whenever you need to find culinary talent.

clientEvents.title: Manage Events
clientEvents.desc: Create and manage your culinary events.
clientEvents.step0Content: This page lists all your events. You can see their status, date, and how many chefs have applied.
clientEvents.step1Content: Click here to post a new event. You'll specify the date, cuisine type, guest count, and budget.
clientEvents.step2Content: After hiring a chef, your bookings will appear in the Bookings section. Track status and communicate with your chef.

messages.title: Messages
messages.desc: Chat with your hired chefs or clients in real time.
messages.step0Content: Access your conversations here. You can message the chefs you've hired (or clients who hired you) in real time.

chefOverview.title: Chef Dashboard
chefOverview.desc: View your chef stats, bookings, and application status.
chefOverview.step0Content: Welcome to your chef dashboard. This shows your current status and key metrics.
chefOverview.step1Content: This banner shows your application status — whether you need to apply, are under review, or have an interview scheduled.
chefOverview.step2Content: Once approved, you'll see your completed events, average rating, and active bookings here.

chefProfile.title: Chef Profile
chefProfile.desc: Manage your professional profile, portfolio, and specialties.
chefProfile.step0Content: Go to your profile to update your bio, cuisine specialties, portfolio images, and social links. A complete profile attracts more clients!

security.title: Security Settings
security.step0Content: Visit Security to enable two-factor authentication, manage passkeys for passwordless login, and view active sessions.

installApp.title: Install the App
installApp.desc: Install MyChef as a native app on your device.
installApp.step0Content: Go to Install App to add MyChef to your home screen. It works offline, loads instantly, and sends push notifications.
